downloadTitle: Unloading Master Data from SAP BI 7.0 using Open Hub Service
downloadDescription: How to use SAP Open Hub Service for unloading data from

downloadFile.name: Microsoft BI and SAP NetWeaver - XMLA Interface.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/7/5/175af735-edab-41db-b762-1b259ec5b362/Microsoft BI and SAP NetWeaver - XMLA Interface.pdf

downloadFile.name: Microsoft BI and SAP NetWeaver - SSIS.pdf

detailsSection:
This paper describes how to use SAP Open Hub Service for unloading data from
SAP NetWeaver BI for integrating with Microsoft Business Intelligence (Microsoft BI).
The paper contains a detailed walk-through of how to configure SAP NetWeaver BI
for unloading the master data and retrieving this data in Microsoft SQL Server by
using SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).
